1. Town Council & Council Meeting Packet

Town Council & Council Meeting Packet
=====================================

* 2nd and 4th Tuesdays of every month, and open to the public
* The Town Council meetings will be hybrid. They will be held in-person in Upper Maple Center, 104 Commercial St and via livestream, unless otherwise noted on the Agenda. Please view the Calendar on the homepage for livestream information.

Residents and interested parties can address the Town Council during the Community Comments portion of the agenda.

Agendas & Minutes
Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.
View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes
.
